Summary._: Southbound [2] trains have resumed local service in the Bronx after EMS helped a customer at Pelham Pkwy.

Summary._: There are residual delays in [6] service in both directions following an earlier incident at Parkchester. You may experience crowded platforms.

Description._: There are residual delays in 6 service in both directions following an earlier incident at Parkchester. You may experience crowded platforms.

LongDescription: There are residual delays in [6] service in both directions following an earlier incident at Parkchester. You may experience crowded platforms along the Lexington Avenue line as congestion clears and service returns to normal.

Summary._: [B] [D] [N] [Q] [R] [W] train service has extensive delays after a train's brakes were activated at Prospect Park and we helped a sick customer at Atlantic Av.

Description._: B D N Q R W trains have extensive delays after a train's brakes were activated at Prospect Park and we helped a sick customer at Atlantic Av.

LongDescription:
[B] [D] [N] [Q] [R] [W] train service has extensive delays in both directions after a train's brakes were activated at Prospect Park and we helped a sick customer at Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr.

Please allow additional travel time and consider alternate service options. We regret the inconvenience these service disruptions have caused.

TRACK REPLACEMENT
Until March 29 (except Mar 28)
Mon to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3 PM
Woodlawn-bound [4] trains skip 183 St, Fordham Rd, Kingsbridge Rd and Bedford Pk Blvd in the Bronx


For service to these stations, take the [4] to Mosholu Pkwy and transfer to a Crown Hts-bound [4].

For service from these stations, take the [4] to Burnside Av and transfer to a Woodlawn-bound [4].

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA stations.

Summary._: TRACK REPLACEMENT Until April 19 Mon to Fri, 945 AM to 330 PM Astoria-bound [N] trains skip 39 Av, 36 Av, Broadway and 30 Av in Queens

Description._: TRACK REPLACEMENT Until April 19 Mon to Fri, 945 AM to 330 PM Astoria-bound [N] trains skip 39 Av, 36 Av, Broadway and 30 Av in Queens

LongDescription:
TRACK REPLACEMENT
Until April 19
Mon to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM
Astoria-bound [N] trains skip 39 Av, 36 Av, Broadway and 30 Av in Queens


For service to these stations, take the [N] to Astoria Blvd and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [N].

For service from these stations, take the [N] to Queensboro Plaza and transfer to an Astoria-bound [N].

Note: [W] trains will not run in Astoria during this time.

Feb 26 - 28, Tue to Thu, 9 AM to 3 PM
[SIR] Trains board at the St. George-bound platform from Prince's Bay to Tottenville Stations


• Boarding change includes Prince's Bay, Pleasant Plains, Richmond Valley, Arthur Kill and Tottenville Stations.

Summary._: TRACK REPLACEMENT Until April 19 Mon to Fri, 10 AM to 330 PM [W] Service is replaced by [N] trains between 57 St-7 Av in Manhattan and Ditmars Blvd in Queens [W] Trains run every 20 minutes in Manhattan

Description._: TRACK REPLACEMENT Until April 19 Mon to Fri, 10 AM to 330 PM [W] Service is replaced by [N] trains between 57 St-7 Av in Manhattan and Ditmars Blvd in Queens [W] Trains run every 20 minutes in Manhattan

LongDescription:
TRACK REPLACEMENT
Until April 19
Mon to Fri, 10 AM to 3:30 PM
[W] Service is replaced by [N] trains between 57 St-7 Av in Manhattan and Ditmars Blvd in Queens
[W] Trains run every 20 minutes in Manhattan


[W] Trains run between Whitehall St and 57 St-7 Av, and via the [Q] to/from 96 St.

• Transfer between [N]* and [W] trains at Times Sq-42 St (across the platform).

*Manhattan-bound [N] service only between Ditmars Blvd and Queensboro Plaza.

Alternate travel note:
[R] service is also available at 5 Av/59 St and Lexington Av/59 St. Transfer between [R] and [W] trains at 57 St-7 Av.
